byline.original: By JENNIFER CUTRARO and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

abstract: Devising simple solutions to health-related problems.
snippet: Devising simple solutions to health-related problems.
lead_paragraph: Overview | What are some local health care concerns, and what solutions can students propose to address them? In this lesson, students identify a challenge that needs to be addressed, use problem-solving strategies to devise potential solutions and seek input from the greater community through an online forum. Then they propose their ideas and seek feedback from experts.

headline.main: The Small Fixes Challenge: Devising Simple Solutions to Health Problems
